content: type of instructions - written pattern with lots of helpful pictures in the paid version skill level - you must know how to crochet - you must know how to chain single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet flo blo - best for intermediate crocheters finished size - 3 5 x 9 25 inches approx yarn & hook - 3mm crochet hook - yarn info in pdf file languages - english only please note - colors will vary from screen to screen and when printing terms of use - for personal use only do not copy share or sell the pattern in part or whole you may sell the finished item made using this pattern refund policy - all digital sales are final about truly crochet is my blog where i share my latest free crochet patterns this version on etsy is an ad-free version of my free pattern which can be found here https //trulycrochet com/ featuring ads
